idea: Cretso Pvt Ltd is an entity with global potential in the Media and Advertising space. Cretso is an innovative AI based service for the Media & Advertising industry to connect with Creative & Performing talents across the globe, identify the right talent with help of AI tools, and efficiently book talents for multiple requirements at the same time, thus, enabling faster than ever content production. Cretso is also a platform for Creative & Performing Talents to get discovered for projects that are suitable to their skill sets.
name: CRETSO PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: To address the massive issue of ever increasing irrigation water scarcity/irregularity, we have come up with an innovative solution of using moisture content in the air, along with efficient irrigation techniques like drip irrigation, Olla and Hydroponics, to create profitable agriculture options for farmers in several parts of the country. We further intend to use solar to make it a low energy consuming, totally make-in-india product.

idea: Make My Presence Pvt. Ltd is a leading Digital Marketing Agency in Mumbai with a client centric approach to Online Marketing. name: Make My Presence Pvt Ltd.

idea:
Stellar Rubber Rollers are one of the leading Rubber rollers manufacturer and supplier in India. We are instrumental in providing premium quality of Printing Machine Rollers. Our wide range of products consists of Printing Rollers, Varnishing Rollers, Laminating Rollers, Alcohol Dampening Rollers, Roto Gravure Rollers, Combi Rollers and Coating Rollers These rollers are manufactured using synthetic rubber ‘Nitrile’, which is popularly known for its outstanding properties of oil and solvent resistance. Moreover, this rubber has resistance from heat and it is free from abrasion. Our range of Printing Rubber rollers is widely used in different sectors across India due to its unmatched quality and superior performance. These printing rollers are highly adaptable and are available in different shapes and sizes. We can also custom design our range of printing rollers according to the specific requirements of the customers.

Read More
name: STELLAR RUBBER ROLLERS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We are building an e-commerce Website and App. Anyone who does any business will find this app and website extremely helpful. There will also be many options available to grow the business, such as investments and loans.

idea: TEANAE CAFE PRIVATE LIMITED  is India’s favourite hangout for coffee and conversations. Popularly known as CCD, we strive to provide the best experience to our guests. Our coffees are sourced from thousands of small coffee planters, who made us who we are today and we're glad to be a part of their lives.
